tool.name: OpenSwathConfidenceScoring
tool.description: Compute confidence scores for OpenSwath results
tool.command:
OpenSwathConfidenceScoring
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_lib: -lib $param_lib #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_trafo: -trafo $param_trafo #end if #if $param_decoys: -decoys $param_decoys #end if #if $param_transitions: -transitions $param_transitions #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #if $adv_opts.param_GLM_intercept: -GLM:intercept $adv_opts.param_GLM_intercept #end if #if $adv_opts.param_GLM_delta_rt: -GLM:delta_rt $adv_opts.param_GLM_delta_rt #end if #if $adv_opts.param_GLM_dist_int: -GLM:dist_int $adv_opts.param_GLM_dist_int #end if #end if

param.name: param_decoys
param.label: Number of decoy assays to select from the library for every true assay (0 for "all")

param.name: param_transitions
param.label: Number of transitions per feature to consider (highest intensities first; 0 for "all")

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Compute confidence scores for OpenSwath results
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_OpenSwathConfidenceScoring.html
